author: S. Ghantasala

review: So far so good. I have the Apple TV and the Roku Box. So I am very familiar with these types of sets. I even had the Chromcast before I gave to my sister. This was a really easy one to set up. And the remote is nice and sleek, albeit, a bit to sensitive. I got this when it was on sale for $19 for Prime members. I like that it gives me really easy and fast access to all the video that I have through my Prime account. Before this I used the app on the Roku and it was slow and buggy. I do hope that Amazon expands that app library to include HBO Go and a few other missing ones. The one complaint I have is that I also bought the Fire Tablet 6 Inch and the app for the Fire TV does not work on it (cannot even install it). This is a very strange move by Amazon, which I hope they correct real soon. Besides that, I think that if you are an Amazon Prime member and deciding between this and the others, this one definitely is worth the buy.
